properties.name: app.promo.name
properties.description: The application's name in places where "promo" style might be used.

properties.name: app.version
properties.description: Application version, extracted from Maven's project.version key.

properties.name: twitter.consumerKey
properties.description: This is the consumer key for the TwitterFactory.

properties.name: twitter.consumerSecret
properties.description: This is the consumer secret. Will be exposed via server config later.

properties.name: credits.license
properties.description: URL of the license pertaining to Lyrebird as plaintext.
